GSD.description:
debugfs: add debugfs_lookup_and_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit 94c84128adb190a7621505891566145de206224a. For more details please see the references link.
